subject: Congratulations!!! You have be
body:
Congratulations!!! You have been chosen as one of  the Facebook and
Instagram winners!
Follow the instructions below to receive your Winning gift !!!
To be a winner.
Confirm your victory
If you have successfully registered, take a screenshot and send it to
us, because it is a promo redemption code and the message "DONE",
after reading this message to process the registration, and if not, I
will give you this opportunity to others.
    remember you are the lucky one to receive this message.
So  "Good luck"
Facebook and Instagram Agent
Ms Jenny Blice
reply to
facebookdepartmentusa@gmail.com

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! You have be
body:
Hello Ms. Jenny Blice,

Wow, I can't believe I've been chosen as one of the winners! This is such exciting news. Could you please tell me more about this? What exactly have I won? And how was I selected?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Tommy

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! You have be
body:
Congratulations Dear Beneficiary.


I emailed to congratulate you, and also to inform you that you are among

the link below to reconfirm your  winnings. Lucky  No,Ticket No,Serial No
and Price No.


Firstly you will have to write this numbers down because it is important

and compulsory.


Lucky Number (FB-17 98 09 67 46)

Ticket Number (FB-00545188564756)

Serial Number (5368/02)

Winning Number(FB/575061725)

Prize Number(77801209/N


Do write it down now and get back to me as soon as you are done .


Thank You

Your Claim Agent

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! You have be
body:
Congratulations From Facebook!!!


Attention Sir/Ma,


 You might have been contacted by some individuals,companies or group of
people that you had won a lottery. Facebook lottery is real and legit,
which you can confirm this yourself without anyone contacting you in
regards to it.


I am delighted to inform you that your name, email and phone number
was among our 152 lucky selected winners in the Facebook
Instagram compensation 2023-2024 going on,  Which you
won the sum of $900,000.00.


Am your claim officers, and could
love to know if you are ready in claiming your winning prize..?


To confirm if you had won, there are 3 ways to do that.

 visit/click the link below.

Link:  https://facebookclaimusa20.wixsite.com/promo



   1. Fill the form on the link with the winning numbers below.


Lucky Number (FB-17 98 09 67 46)

Ticket Number (FB-00545188564756)

Serialas Number (5368/02)

Winning Number(FB/575061725)

Prize Number(77801209/N



   1. Send, and you will automatically get a response from the link to
   confirm if you had won or not.


Those are the only ways to avoid been scam of being a Winner on any ongoing
lottery promo. This are the only reason and it’s for your own good, and to
fight internet scammers.
Best Regards

Contact agent.

Richard Lincoln

Facebook Department

1 Hacker Way

Menlo Park, San Mateo County 94025

USA

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! You have be
body:
Hello Richard Lincoln,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this exciting news with me! I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear that I might have won the Facebook Instagram lottery. 

I'm curious about how this process works. How was my name, email, and phone number selected? And could you please explain more about these winning numbers? Are they unique to each winner?

Also, I noticed you mentioned a link for me to click on and fill out a form. However, I can't seem to find the link in your message. Could you kindly resend it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Tommy

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! You have be
body:

I want you to know that the draws was conducted by a random selection of

The Facebook organization compensation program which is a new innovation by

Below is the link.


visit/click the link below.

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! You have be
body:

Wow, that's quite interesting! I had no idea Facebook was doing such a thing. It's really nice to see them giving back to their users like this.

Could you please tell me more about how this process works? How was I selected and what do I need to do next?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! You have be
body:
Good Morning Dear Lucky Winner. Mr Tommy,

I am delighted to inform you that your name was among our 152 lucky
selected winners in the Facebook compensation lottery 2023 that is going
on, Which you won the sum of $900,000.00 and I am here to know if you are
ready to claim your winning prize..?

So, all you need to do is for you to follow my instructions that will be
given to you, is that understood?

I want you to know that we have two ways our lucky winners receive their
winning prize and you have to choose one of the options and get back to us
so that we can process it ...

1, ATM CARD (delivery)
2, CHECK (delivery)

You are advised to choose anyone for this process now ..

Regard
Mark

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! You have be
body:
Hello Mark,

Wow, this is such exciting news! I can't believe I won the Facebook lottery. I didn't even know there was one. Can you tell me more about how this works? How did my name get selected?

As for the delivery options, could you please explain a bit more about them? What's the difference between ATM CARD delivery and CHECK delivery?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Tommy

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! Once More.
body:
Sir Mr. Tommy


1, ATM CARD (Delivery) We will facilitate an ATM CARD, which we will load
your winning funds into and deliver it to your doorstep or you can come
down in person to the office and pick it up.


2, CHECK (Delivery) A Cashier Check will be issued out in your name wand it
will be delivered to your address or you come down and pickup in person.


Because of our pasted experience, I want to inform to you that we do advise
all our winners to keep there winnings prize compensation strict from
people as we have seen and heard a lot of things that had happened to most
of our winners before they get / receive  there prize and after getting
there prize.


As Mr David Peterson was killed cos of is winnings prize, as well as Mrs
Esther Foster, was kidnapped cos of her winnings prize and John Wilson was
robbed of his winnings prize as well then we advise our winners to keep it
strict and safe.
Regards

Your claim Agent.

Richard Lincoln.

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! Once More.
body:
Hello Mr. Richard Lincoln,

Thank you for your message and the options provided for receiving the winning funds. It's quite a surprise to hear about this win! I'm sorry to hear about the unfortunate incidents that happened with Mr. David Peterson, Mrs. Esther Foster, and John Wilson. That must have been very distressing.

Could you please provide more details about this winning prize? How was I selected as a winner? Also, could you explain more about how the ATM card delivery works? Is there any fee associated with it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Tommy

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! Once More.
body:
Good Day



    Attached is the picture of your Facebook ATM Card, which has been
facilitated and ready . We have Two different processes all lucky winner
get their winnings without any conflicts ..



1. All winners are to come over to the Facebook Headquarters at the
claiming department at Menlo Park Way CA . and claim there winning with a
valid i.d card .


2. Winners can also get the winning prize at there hand through a delivery
diplomat ..i.e your winning will be delivered to your home at your doorstep
through FedEx or a courier delivery diplomat .


You are advised to choose any one of this process now ..


Richard Lincoln

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! Once More.
body:
Hello Richard Lincoln,

Thank you for reaching out and congratulations to all the lucky winners! It's great to hear that Facebook is doing such a wonderful initiative. 

I'm curious about the two different processes you mentioned. Could you please elaborate more on them? Also, how does the delivery process work? Is there any specific courier service involved?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! Once More.
body:
Congratulations to you once again


You are to contact the FedEX COURIER COMPANY for the delivery of your
winning ATM Card Prize, because find below the details of the courier
company and proceed to contact them.


You have to send your delivery details to the FedEx Courier delivery
company.

FedEx Shipping Services.

Name Daniel Walt.

Email: fedxdeliveryservices00@gmail.com


Please be advice to follow to the instructions of the delivery courier
company,so that your won prize can get to your present address in time.


Note: For security reason, you are to keep your winning information
confidential and do not discuss with third parties until the FEDEX COURIER
COMPANY have successfully deliver your winning prize ATM Card to you,
in-order to avoid double claims which may lead to disclaiming of your prize


Congratulations once again.

Yours Sincerely

Richard

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! Once More.
body:
Hello Richard,

Thank you for your message. I'm thrilled to hear about this winning ATM Card Prize! It's not every day that one gets such good news.

I understand that I need to contact the courier company for the delivery of my prize. Could you please provide me with more details about this process? For instance, how should I get in touch with Mr. Daniel Walt? Is there a specific email address or phone number I should use?

Also, could you clarify what information exactly I need to send to the courier delivery company? You mentioned "delivery details", but I want to make sure I don't miss anything important.

Lastly, you mentioned not discussing this with third parties until the FedEx Courier Company has delivered my prize. Could you explain why this is necessary?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Tommy

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! Once More.
body:
Mr Tommy,


I believe you got the FedEx email address which I sent you and you could
use the email to contact them and you advised you follow their instructions
if you want your package to be delivered.
Regards
Richard

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! Once More.
body:

subject: Re: Congratulations!!! Once More.
body:
Hello Tommy

We asked you to choose any of the means which you want to receive your ATM
card winning Funds, but if you chose the delivery option method then you
will have to provide the information below.


Here are the pictures and Videos of our present winners that just received
their winnings yesterday for your view. Texted you using my Google  Chat

those pictures and videos to you.


FedEx will deliver your winnings prize compensation to your door and they
request your information below!!!

FULL NAME:
CONTACT ADDRESS:

EMAIL:

The processing of your Facebook winnings either delivery has been completed

Note. that you will be responsible for the delivery fee of your winnings to
your door step that is, you will have to pay the delivery fee before your

Best Regards
Richard
